code: import React from'react';import{SplitLayout,SelectionChip,TextInput,NavButton}from'../components';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NationalityScreen(_ref){let{data,update,onNext,onBack}=_ref;const nationalities=['United Kingdom','United States','India','China','Nigeria','Germany','France','Brazil','Japan','Australia','Canada','South Korea','Mexico','Italy','Spain','Other'];const handleSelect=nat=>{if(nat==='Other'){update('nationalityCategory','Other');if(data.nationalityCategory!=='Other'){update('nationality','');}}else{update('nationality',nat);update('nationalityCategory',nat);}};const canProceed=data.nationality&&data.nationality.trim().length>0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SplitLayout,{progress:29,leftTitle:"Where are you from?",rightContent:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:'26px',fontWeight:'600',color:'#1a1a1a',marginBottom:'28px'},children:"What's your nationality?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:'12px',marginBottom:'16px'},children:nationalities.map(nat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SelectionChip,{label:nat,selected:(nat==='Other'?data.nationalityCategory:data.nationality)===nat,onClick:()=>handleSelect(nat)},nat))}),data.nationalityCategory==='Other'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{label:"Please specify your nationality",value:data.nationality||'',onChange:v=>update('nationality',v),placeholder:"e.g., Swedish, Polish, Thai..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginTop:'40px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onBack,direction:"back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onNext,disabled:!canProceed})]})]})});}export default NationalityScreen;
